name: Oedo Trigger VR!!
description:
The Oedo Trigger!! is now available in VR!!
■Story
The main character was living an ordinary life, but a mysterious girl he met on the street asked him to help her.
He accepts and is suddenly transported back in time to the Edo period !
He ends up fighting with a ray gun against a large number of attacking girls!

■Game System
This is a VR-first-person shooter game.
There are 37 stages!
